item.title: Dharmasthala Mass Murder Case Escalates to Delhi: Grievance Seeks NIA Probe, Alleges State Government Obstruction
item.description: Dharmasthala / New Delhi — A formal grievance submitted through the Central Government’s CPGRAMS portal has raised serious concerns about the handling of the Dharmasthala mass murder case. The petitioner has urged the Ministry of Home Affairs to transfer the case to the National Investigation Agency (NIA), citing international dimensions and obstruction by senior Karnataka political fi
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: YouTubers Attacked by Alleged Dharmasthala D-Gang: A Blow to Press Freedom
item.description: Dharmasthala, Karnataka – 6th August 2025 In a shocking incident that has sparked widespread outrage, two independent YouTubers were reportedly attacked while covering ongoing developments around the mysterious deaths and criminal allegations in and around the Dharmasthala region. item.title: Bangalore to Dharmasthala Solo Trip Plan
item.description: One or Two days Trip from Bangalore to Dharmasthala to Bangalore, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in Car, then this one or two days plan works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly, if at all you need to spend some more time in some place in the list, you can skip the next place in the planned route.
